title: Have US$100k to spare? Take a cruise around the globe! (VIDEO)
text:
Have US$100k to spare? Take a cruise around the globe! (VIDEO) Friday August 14, 2015 Print Article 
NEW YORK, Aug 14 — Bloomberg's Pimm Fox reports on Norwegian Cruise Line’s US$100,000 (RM401,770) round-the-world cruise. He speaks on ‘Bloomberg Markets’. — Bloomberg Norwegian Cruise Line’s 128-night, round-the-world cruise sees the luxurious ship visit 60 ports across six continents. — Bloomberg pic More Stories for You:
